name: WarmTouch Pro Period Cramp Relief Device with Heat & Vibration Therapy
description: Experience soothing relief during your menstrual cycle with the WarmTouch Pro. This innovative device combines gentle heat therapy (up to 55°C) with targeted vibration massage to alleviate cramps and discomfort. The ergonomic curved design hugs your lower abdomen perfectly, while the cordless rechargeable battery provides up to 4 hours of continuous relief. Features 3 heat levels and 5 vibration modes controlled via intuitive touch buttons. The soft medical-grade silicone is skin-friendly and easy to clean. USB-C charging cable included.

The 4 floating heads flex and pivot to follow body contours for a close, comfortable shave on legs, arms, underarms, and bikini area. description: Relieve muscle tension anywhere with MuscleGun Mini. This compact percussion massager delivers powerful deep tissue massage in a pocket-sized package. The high-torque motor provides up to 3200 percussions per minute to break up knots and improve circulation. 4 speed levels and 4 interchangeable heads target different muscle groups: ball for large muscles, bullet for trigger points, flat for general use, and fork for spine and neck. The whisper-quiet brushless motor won't disturb others. USB-C rechargeable battery lasts up to 6 hours. The ergonomic grip and lightweight design (only 550g) make it perfect for gym bags and travel. Speed up recovery, reduce soreness, and enhance performance with regular use.
